name: py-umap-learn

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) is a dimension
reduction technique that can be used for visualisation similarly to
t-SNE, but also for general non-linear dimension reduction.

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pynndescent
dependencies.description:
PyNNDescent is a Python nearest neighbor descent for approximate nearest
neighbors.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-scanpy
dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.

dependent_to.name: cryodrgn
dependent_to.description:
CryoDRGN is a neural network based algorithm for heterogeneous cryo-EM
reconstruction. In particular, the method models a continuous
distribution over 3D structures by using a neural network based
representation for the volume
